title: Good Omens (DVD bonus) - Bookshop Tour
author: PsychoLeague No.9
comment: It’s such a lovely sentiment to have Terry Pratchett’s hat hanging there, just waiting for him to come back.
Dear lord. Aziraphale has has hung up Terry Pratchett's hat waiting for him to come back, Neil probably didn't mean anything by that but now I can't stop thinking about it.
He actually chokes up a bit when talking about Terry Pratchett...

If you should find yourself in this shop, under NO FUCKING CIRCUMSTANCE there is no buying of books! Come in and simply browse to your hearts content,  if you can find a place to sit, sit and read.  And if you catch him at a good moment, be sure to strike up a conversation about the subject of literature. Share your favorite stories and books with him. Maybe he'll enjoy them himself and keep them in his collection.  But remember....under no circumstance are his books for sale and must NEVER leave the premises. You have been warned. Take care. If you do not heed he will smite you....or he'll have that luscious ginger who always hangs about do it for him 😈
And then they burned the whole thing down in real life (I’d imagine they saved Terry’s hat first though).
